JobTitle: Product Management Sr. Advisor - Integrated Solutions  (Remote, US)
JobFullDesc: Product Management Sr Advisor -Integrated Solutions - Remote, USJoin us as a Sr Advisor on our Product Management team to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.This Product Manager role will be responsible for offer planning, product management, strategy and offer roadmap for Solution Services in partnership with ecosystem partners, product engineering, sales, delivery organizations internally and partners, and customers externally. This role requires technical knowledge and solutions product management experience and a solid understanding of solutions ecosystems (ISVs, SIs, etc.) and infrastructure systems such as servers, storage and networking.  It is highly desirable that you have experience in HPC, Data Analytics, AI/ML, VDI or traditional databases as a product manager or an offering manager. He / She will also be responsible for defining the roadmap, writing and understanding requirements and developing content for Dell Technologies Integrated Solutions.
